title: Team Up and Pool Party coming up!

Kill Satan!
Dont wanna be that guy, but Riot said that its actually impossible to delete a champion.....HOWEVER! That dont mean they cant disable him forever :>

Points will be...pooled...together from all regions ;)

EzrealZacLeeSinTheBlindMonk?
I like how most people are focused on the rewards, rather than ZAC FINALLY GETTING  A SECOND SKIN FOR THE FIRST TIME IN 3 YEARS

I feel like Zac is the hardest champ to release skins for because he's just a blob. Just releasing new colors would be kinda lame, so they have to really really develop something cool. My Props to Riot for their work {{item:2010}}

Guys I just crunched some numbers and this goal is EASY to reach. 27 million people play the game every day so if one third of those people got together and made 5 man parties and won at least one game every day for 7 days we would have 10 million divided by 5 (5 per party) * 7 days a week is 14 million but you get 5 points so 14*5 is 70 MILLION SO JUST MAKE IT YOUR GOAL TO WIN ONE GMAE A DAY WITH A 5 MAN PARTY AND WE ARE GOLD!!!!
it becomes even easier if people send gifts. if 20ish % people send gifts we are there.
well men, 35mil is our goal it seems.
I will gift the feeders to reach this dank goal.
Pool Party Rek'Sai, then, you gotta roam the River and play that Shark music. And Report Rek'Sai for just standing in the middle of the river while singing JAWS music.

Wait... pool party mundo unlocked.. for everyone? or what? im confused. ALSO POOL PARTY MINIONS RITO PLEASE. (you owe me for all the money ive shamefully given you)
If we reach 55 million points, everyone who helped contribute points gets the skin (and champ) for free.
Its not possible to win 1 million games in 6 days.....
It's community wide, so everyone contributes to one pool of points. :)
Then whats the purpose of even trying to win? wouldnt it be best to purposly lose asap to end games to give points out?

{{champion:36}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:117}}

POOL PARTY YEAR ROUND!!!
POOL PARTY {{champion:154}} !?!?!? YESH!!! YEEEESSHHH!!!

but... where are the prehistoric skins? T_T
Must get pool party minions *_*

On a side note... 5 skins then Mundo (totalling 6) or 5 including Mundo which would be only 4 if we don't unlock him?

Well if its 5 + Mundo... In that image I can only see:
1.Mundo
2.Zac
3.Lulu
4.Reksai
5.Draven

So ye a little confused... Can't roll out 5 skins if we don't reach enough points for pool party mundo...
Mundo is included in the 5. He will be available for purchase but if the goal is met everyone gets him for free.
What about the champion? Do we get him too if we don't own him already?
In every previous case, if you got a skin for free, you got the champion for free.
I think it means more everyone gets pool party mundo for free.
